Medium: One from a portfolio of ten lithographs
\ufeffTitle: "WITHIN A TWENTY INCH SQUARE AREA, USING A BLACK, HARD CRAYON, DRAW TEN THOUSAND FREEHAND LINES, OF ANY LENGTH, AT RANDOM. PRINT THIS IN FOUR COLORS (BLACK, RED, BLUE AND YELLOW) BY TURNING THE STONE A QUARTER TURN FOR EACH COLOR.", from the portfolio WORK FROM INSTRUCTIONS
